message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $150?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $165.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your need to make a living, I'm still looking to keep costs down. Could we perhaps aim for $150?
